name: Piston Pushers
description:
Instructions:

Move from platform to platform to stay alive as long as you can

Firing will heat up your weapon causing it to shoot slower

Getting hit by an enemy will cause you to be knocked back further from subsequent attacks 

Controls:

Keyboard:

WASD/Arrow keys - Move

Left mouse - Shoot

F1 - Toggle fullscreen

Controller:

Left stick - Move

Right stick - Aim

R1 - Shoot
